description:
Get amazing deals, discount codes, and exclusive offers from Healthkart at Discount One. Find deals on medicines, healthcare products, and wellness essentials. 

Don’t miss out on incredible discounts with our Healthkart coupons!

posts.post_content:
Wild Buck Isotonic is a revolutionary sports drink for athletes, weight lifters and players
The essential electrolytes are lost through sweat and Wild Buck Isotonic helps balance the levels of Sodium, Potassium, Phosphorous, Magnesium, and Chloride to keep the cells functioning properly eliminating fatigue
Intense workouts and change in exercise routines may cause severe muscular cramps, Isotonic formula is developed to keep the essential minerals in check to reduce the frequency and impact of cramps
posts.post_title: Wild Buck Iso Tonic Instant Energy Drink,  2.2 lb  Pineapple

posts.post_content:
Full of Energy - A product that is formulated to keep in mind that you need extra energy whether you'e a professional athlete or fitness enthusiasts. That's why you get 120 kcal instant energy dose per serving with Proathlix Isotonic energy drink 1kg.
Serving Per Pack - Each 1kg pack contains 30 servings with 33g serving size. Each serving you get dose of energy, carbs, L-Glutamine, Sodium, Potassium and Vitamin C. That's one of many reasons that make this Isotonic drink for gym purpose.
Perfect Balance of Sodium and Potassium - With the ratio of 1:2.8 (Potassium and Sodium) we have made sure that it helps you in restoring electrolyte balance and prevents cramps if you have heavy fitness routine.

posts.post_content:
Carbohydrates are one of the most essential macronutrients ,which are crucial for proper functioning of the body,development and growth of muscle tissues and building of strong physique.carbohydrates are like fuel for our body
When you train you reduce your blood sugar level considerably.eating carbohydrates straight after a training session provides your body with an insulin spike.this insulin spike puts your body into an anabolic state and build more muscle faster
Take 1 levelled scoop in 150ml water 30-40 minutes before exercise.and take 1 levelled scoop in 150ml water just after exrercise

Wild Buck Carbs Loader is carbohydrates releasing supplement and provides instant energy to balance the blood glucose levels. It's designed for elite athletes looking for a fast, safe, and high-performance way to quickly and easily load muscles with lasting energy and for faster recovery.
SOURCE OF CARBOHYDRATES - The body uses carbohydrates as its main source of energy, especially during exercise. Maltodextrin can be used to replace the carbohydrates lost through sweat during an intense workout or athletic event.
INTRA WORKOUT SUPPLEMENT - This maltodextrin powder is made from non-GMO corn starch and can be added to your pre-workout shake or intra workout drink. It's also great in smoothies!

Contains electrolytes which help maintain the electrolyte and water balance in the body during workout to prevent dehydration

Contains electrolytes which help maintain the electrolyte and water balance in the body during workout to prevent dehydration
NOTE: Since ingredients are hygroscopic in nature, they'll tend to lump. However the supplement is completely safe to consume after grind

Energy 14.00 Kcal, Carbohydrates 3.50g, L-Leucine 2500mg, L-Glutamine 2500mg, L-Citruline 1000gm, L-Taurine 500mg, L-Isoleucine 1250mg, L-Valine 1250mg, Vitamin B6 640mcg
Amino Acid Interfusion: 13g of 100% vegan micronized amino acids per serving. , Ayurvedic: No. , Muscle Recovery: Amino acids supports Muscle Recovery following exercise. , Muscle Endurance: Push harder during training with the inclusion of BCAAs to the formula which can help take your performance to the next level. , Supports Lean Muscle Mass: BCAA intra-workout powder promotes muscle development and maintenance while supporting lean muscle mass and reducing muscle breakdown. , Convenient Powder Form: BCAA powder mixes easily with water and contains zero calories, zero carbohydrates, and zero grams of sugar. , Banned Substance Tested: Athletes can be assured it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure that it is not contaminated with banned substances and is safe to use.
Mix 1 scoop with 250-300ml of water. Shake well to dissolve. Drink during exercise on training days or throughout the day on non-training days. For best results, use 1 scoop per day.
Consult your physician in case you are taking any other medication before consuming this product.

posts.post_content:
Muscle Recovery is just as important for training hard when it comes to any fitness routine and having a reliable support system for this recovery can help you go that extra mile. ZEELAB Athlete Branched-Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) is powered with a combination of 2:1:1 namely Leucine, Valine & Isoleucine along with an interesting Cola Flavour. This unique and delicious formula will help you optimize recovery levels so you can train harder, stronger and faster. It is used as a fuel during intense workout powered by 6g of Branched-Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs), which has been clinically shown to support muscle recovery and growth. It is important to get enough amino acids into the body before exercise to benefit both performance and recovery.
Any fitness enthusiast who wants to gain muscle and strength will find ZEELAB Athlete BCAA useful. ZEELAB Athlete BCAA is perfect for anybody who does intense workouts or looking to go leaner, harder & stronger. ZEELAB Athlete BCAA is a potent branched-chain amino acid supplement that helps fitness enthusiasts gain muscle and strength. When youre working out intensely, your body may break down muscle fibers for energy. By supplementing with ZEELAB Athlete Essential BCAA powder before or after workouts, youll have plenty of BCAA available for use by your muscles throughout each training session. This may also help in keeping blood sugar levels steady, so your brain stays focused, and you can power through your workouts. It also provides electrolytes to prevent dehydration and preventing muscle fatigue.
BCAA helps build lean muscle so you can increase your strength and endurance. ZEELAB Athlete Essential BCAA can be more than just an amino acid; its a BCAA combo that may provide superior absorption and results when compared with any typical BCAA supplements. ZEELAB Athlete Branched Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs) contain of three essential amino acids - Leucine, Valine, and Isoleucine. With the essential amino acids such as, Leucine, Isoleucine and Valine, it offers 2g L-Glutamine, Citrulline Malate to boost muscle recovery. These amino acids are the building blocks of protein and our muscle too. Our body cant make these amino acids by its own, thats why we need to take them from outside. On taking BCAAs our body can use them to build muscle protein and produce energy.
